holisticai.bias.mitigation.Reweighing¶

class holisticai.bias.mitigation.Reweighing(*args, **kwargs)¶

Reweighing preprocessing weights the examples in each group-label combination to ensure fairness before classification.

References

Kamiran, Faisal, and Toon Calders. “Data preprocessing techniques for classification without discrimination.” Knowledge and information systems 33.1 (2012): 1-33.

fit_transform(X: numpy.ndarray, y_true: numpy.ndarray, group_a: numpy.ndarray, group_b: numpy.ndarray, sample_weight: Optional[numpy.ndarray] = None)¶

Fit transform.

Description

Access fitted sample_weight param with self.estimator_params[“sample_weight”]. The transform returns the same object inputed.
